00031 class cuda_runtime_error : public exception {
00032         private:
00033                 // the error
00034                 cudaError_t error_;
00035         public:
00040                 cuda_runtime_error(cudaError_t error): error_(error) {}
00041                 char const* what() const throw() {
00042                         return cudaGetErrorString(error_);
00043                 }
00044 };
